div.head: 傷寒太陽證
div.div: harm caused by cold with signs in the major yang section

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: harm caused by cold with signs in the major yang section

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with tai yang shang han 太陽傷寒 , 太陽傷寒 , harm caused by cold in the major yang section. Shang han lei zheng huo ren shu 傷寒類證活人書 9: 傷寒太陽證，衄血者乃解，蓋陽氣重故也 , “ Harm caused by cold with signs in the major yang section is resolved by nosebleed. The reason is [nosebleed carries away] a preponderance of yang qi”.
